home.hero: Welcome to the AI assisted notes tool

hero.heading: AI assistants to improve your productivity
hero.description: Discover and try AI-powered assistants for your writing tasks. If none of them are suitable, create your own.

newsletter.heading: Subscribe to our newsletter.
newsletter.description: Keep up to date with our latest releases and more.
newsletter.weekly_articles_description: We post weekly articles with all the stack and implementation details for this tool.
newsletter.no_spam_description: We respect your privacy. We won't share your personal data with no one else. We won't send you emails non-related with the product.
